lead_paragraph: STRONGWATER--Robert M.,born in NYC June 5, 1937, beloved father, husband, grandfather, brother, uncle, businessman passed away on March 23, 2016. Services will be held Sunday, March 27, 2016 at noon at The Riverside Memorial Chapel in Mount Vernon, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STRONGWATER, ROBERT M.
